tool_description: In this API , you  will find the latest updates/news of SpaceX that what they are doing  & what will they do next. Every new news/updates Data related to SpaceX are in this API.   This data is taken from authentic articles of SpaceX updates.
name: spaceX updates
title: spaceX updates

api_list.name: all updates
api_list.description: In this endpoint you will find all the updates of spaceX.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spacex-updates.p.rapidapi.com/updates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spacex-updates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spacex-updates.p.rapidapi.com/updates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

api_list.name: specific update date
api_list.description:
In this endpoint , you can access specific time  updates. Here you will need
to put "month name in small alphabets i.e 'february' OR you can also put the year i,e 2022,2020 etc.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spacex-updates.p.rapidapi.com/updates/february"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spacex-updates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spacex-updates.p.rapidapi.com/updates/{date}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spacex-updates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
